survey_name: Community Feedback on Urban Green Spaces Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather community feedback on the usage, satisfaction, and desired improvements for urban green spaces in the city.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit urban green spaces (e.g., parks, gardens, trails)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: How often do you visit urban green spaces (e.g., parks, gardens, trails)?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for visiting urban green spaces? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), with an optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for visiting urban green spaces? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of urban green spaces?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction. Ensure clear labeling of options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of urban green spaces?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in urban green spaces?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in urban green spaces?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in community-led green space initiatives (e.g., cleanup events, tree planting)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button. Include an optional text field for respondents to provide contact information if they select 'Yes, definitely' or 'Yes, possibly'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), with conditional follow-up for contact info.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in community-led green space initiatives (e.g., cleanup events, tree planting)?
